overview:
Jan Michael Berkowitz has worked in the clean energy field for over 25 years. As a leader in green energy, Jan Michael Berkowitz offers design and implementation of new energy products.

Jan Michael Berkowitz provides knowledgeable and strategic insight into the clean energy market to a variety of companies and helps companies to understand and embrace that clean, renewable energy is important to both our environment and to a company’s bottom line. Jan Michael Berkowitz provides a variety of clients the necessary information needed to identify custom solutions to weak areas within their business environment and effectively implement and embrace clean energy technology.
